source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_00<tab>With Cid's modifications now installed, the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> is finally ready to make the journey to the Howling Eye.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_00<tab>Cid va vous accompagner affronter Garuda.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_01<tab>Stirred by the familiar roar of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>'s engines, Cid endeavors to recall his past; try though he might, he is unable to navigate the dark corridors of his mind alone. But what if he had company? Wielding the power of the Echo, you guide him through a series of forgotten memories, detailing the path that led the once-loyal engineer to turn his back on Garlemald and flee to Eorzea. When you finally awake from the visions, Cid triumphantly declares that he remembers everything─his name, his people, and his purpose. Shortly thereafter, he guides the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> through Garuda's wall of wind without incident, delivering you to the Howling Eye at long last. Speak with Alphinaud before proceeding into the primal's sanctuary.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_01<tab>L'opération contre Garuda a enfin été lancée. Vous avez traversé les bourrasques avec l'Entreprise et atteint Hurlœil, l'autel sacré de la divinité. Parlez à Alphinaud, qui vous attend à l'entrée.

source:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_02Alphinaud declares that the end is at hand─be it Garuda's or your own. Strike fear into the hearts of beastmen across Eorzea by defeating the Lady of the Vortex.

※Challenge the Howling Eye with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the trial's entrance point.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_02L'heure de la confrontation avec Garuda a sonné. Préparez-vous et engagez le combat avec la terrible Primordiale!

* Vous pouvez faire appel à des PNJ alliés pour accomplir la mission à l'aide du système de renforts, accessible à partir du point d'entrée de celle-ci ou du menu principal.
* Vous pouvez aussi utiliser l'outil de mission pour accomplir le donjon en compagnie d'autres joueurs.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_03<tab>Amidst the whirling winds, you succeed in striking down the Lady of the Vortex, only to see her rise once more, reinvigorated by the belief of her Ixali disciples. Yet the beastmen's prayers come to naught when Garuda's attempt to temper you fails, prompting a mysterious force to tear a Crystal of Light from her breast. It is at this moment that Gaius van Baelsar enters the fray, seemingly bent on goading the defeated primal into one final act of defiance. Garuda duly obliges, slaughtering her captive kobolds and Amalj'aa, whose cries of agony serve to summon their own patron deities. As Garuda prepares to consume the aether of her lesser brethren, the Black Wolf calls forth an unknown imperial weapon which summarily dispatches and seemingly <var 1A 02 /var>absorbs<var 1A 01 /var> all three primals. Wholly unprepared to face this awe-inspiring new foe, you have no choice but to flee for your life.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_03<tab>Au prix de gros efforts, vous avez réussi à vaincre Garuda.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_04<tab>Safely back aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, with the imperial forces now fast-diminishing specks upon the horizon, Cid and Alphinaud begin to discuss how to address this grave new threat. Believing the best course of action is to reform the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, they decide to return to the Waking Sands. Having safely arrived in Ul'dah, speak with Alphinaud prior to continuing on to Vesper Bay.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_04<tab>À présent, parlez à Alphinaud à l'aérodrome d'Ul'dah pour faire le point.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_05<tab>Alphinaud reiterates that the beast tribes and their primals are no longer a threat, and that all efforts must now be focused upon destroying the Empire's ultimate weapon. But having seen what you have seen, it is plain that this task will ask far more of you than any you have undertaken thus far. For Eorzea's sake, you must hope that you are up to the challenge.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_05<tab>La menace des Primordiaux est pour l'instant neutralisée. Gaius semble être le prochain problème dont vous devrez vous préoccuper, maintenant qu'il s'est emparé de l'Ultima Arma, mais pour le moment, savourez votre victoire.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_01<tab>Confront Garuda in the Howling Eye.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_01<tab>Accomplir le défi “Hurlœil”

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_000<tab>According to my tests, the device is now functioning in perfect harmony with the crystal─meaning we can leave whenever you're ready.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_000<tab>Et voilà. J'ai fabriqué un convertisseur éthérique avec les cristaux corrompus que tu as récupérés.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_001<tab>But you must understand: tests can only tell one so much.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_001<tab>Tout d'abord, le cristal de la Noscea convertira le mur de bourrasques de Garuda en élément d'eau.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_002<tab>Until we approach the Howling Eye─until we attempt to breach the barrier itself...I cannot be sure that this will work.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_002<tab>Ensuite, cette eau sera convertie en terre, avec le cristal de Sombrelinceul... puis en feu grâce à celui du Thanalan.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_003<tab>I think it only fair to tell you that there is a small but statistically significant chance that the crystal could trigger a massive...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_003<tab>Bref, en couplant ces cristaux corrompus, j'ai pu créer une chaîne de conversions, et changer le vent en feu.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_004<tab>Hmmm... Mayhap it is better that we remain positive.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_004<tab>C'était un peu complexe, mais ça a marché. Reste l'assemblage...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I want to thank you. For reuniting me with my ship, for trusting in me to develop this plan...for everything. You've helped me to rediscover a part of myself I'd forgotten. I am not the man I once was, and I do not know if I ever shall be...but I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> know one thing: this feels right.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_005<tab>C'est curieux, je ne me souviens de rien, pourtant mes mains savent quoi faire. Et quand je me mets à l'ouvrage, je me sens comme motivé.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_006<tab>...My apologies for the sudden outpouring of sentiment. I would have waited until after the mission, but...well, you understand.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_006<tab>Il ne me reste plus qu'à installer le convertisseur éthérique à bord de l'aéronef pour lui rendre sa grandeur d'autrefois.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000010_CID<tab>There...she's ready...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000010_CID<tab>Voilà... Ça devrait marcher, maintenant.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, she stirs...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est donc cela, le fameux aéronef Entreprise...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>To Coerthas! And an audience with the harpy queen Garuda!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Direction le Coerthas... vers Hurlœil.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>En avant, Entreprise<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000050_CID<tab>Phew...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000050_CID<tab>Aaah...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000060_CID<tab>Damn it!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000060_CID<tab>Oooh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000070_CID<tab>I...I once flew in this airship. And I was not alone.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000070_CID<tab>Autrefois... j'ai navigué sur ce vaisseau, j'ai parcouru le ciel...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000080_CID<tab>There were adventurers on board...adventurers like you.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000080_CID<tab>Emportant avec moi de braves aventuriers comme toi...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100090_CID<tab>Just how long have I worn these damn goggles?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100090_CID<tab>Depuis combien de temps ai-je fait miennes ces lunettes d'aviation<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100100_CID<tab>Ah, yes. I fancied myself a trendsetter in my younger days.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100100_CID<tab>Maintenant que j'y pense, quand j'étais enfant, j'étais toujours habillé comme un premier de la classe.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100110_CID<tab>The young prodigy, admired by all...exactly like his father.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100110_CID<tab>J'aimais qu'on me complimente pour ma bonne conduite. Un véritable enfant modèle<var 1D /var>! Je voulais me rapprocher de mon père.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100120_CID<tab>Born and raised in Garlemald...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100120_CID<tab>Je suis né dans l'empire garlemaldais.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100130_CID<tab>It was only natural that the precocious young student should become an engineer. Had his father not done the same?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100130_CID<tab>J'ai étudié la technologie magitek pour suivre les traces de mon père. Mid nan Garlond... un des plus brillants ingénieurs de l'Empire.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100140_CID<tab>Father... When did we stop seeing eye to eye?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100140_CID<tab>Mais nous sommes devenus des étrangers au fil des ans, lui et moi...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100150_CID<tab>When did Meteor become your everything, and your loved ones cease to matter?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100150_CID<tab>Maintenant que j'y pense, c'est lorsqu'il a commencé à s'intéresser au projet Météore.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100160_CID<tab>You abandoned us all. But he was there for me, Father─there for me when you were not.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100160_CID<tab>À cette époque, un autre homme a pris sa place dans mon existence, et m'a donné l'attention que mon père ne me portait plus. Gaius van Baelsar...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100170_CID<tab>Though he proved no better in the end. Gaius was just another man with an all-consuming obsession.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100170_CID<tab>Il est devenu un modèle, un mentor... Mais au final, la folie des conquêtes lui est montée à la tête, à lui aussi... et j'ai finalement choisi de fuir l'Empire.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100180_CID<tab>And so I ran─left the Empire behind and came to Eorzea, where I built the Ironworks.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100180_CID<tab>Je me suis installé en Éorzéa, utilisant mes con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces pour fonder les Forges de Garlond.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100190_CID<tab>Ah, yes! It was then that I first donned these goggles.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100190_CID<tab>C'est là que j'ai commencé à porter ces drôles de lunettes...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100200_CID<tab>Eorzea opened my eyes. It was home to so many manner of people, each with their own hopes and dreams. People worth saving. And so I fought beside them.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100200_CID<tab>J'ai fait toutes sortes de rencontres, et j'ai même combattu le projet Météore qui avait fait tourner la tête de mon propre père.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100210_CID<tab>I wanted to prove that my knowledge could serve a nobler purpose.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100210_CID<tab>Si j'ai fait tout ça, au fond, c'était pour démontrer que la technologie doit être au service de la paix... non de la guerre.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100220_CID<tab>I wanted to prove that there was another way...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100220_CID<tab>Mais avant tout, c'est à mon père que je voulais le prouver, pour le sauver.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100230_CID<tab>And it all began that day, when I found my new home...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100230_CID<tab>Ces lunettes étaient en quelque sorte le symbole de ma détermination.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200240_CID<tab>I had forgotten how wonderful it was. The wind in your hair, the endless sky...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200240_CID<tab>J'avais oublié ce sentiment grisant du vent passant sur mon visage... de l'ivresse de la vitesse...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200250_CID<tab>That light─it was you, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200250_CID<tab>Cette lumière que j'ai sentie tout à l'heure... je comprends maintenant que c'est de toi qu'elle venait. Merci...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200260_CID<tab>It's surprising how few people know this, but <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> pureblood Garleans have a third eye.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200260_CID<tab>Les Garlemaldais de souche ont un troisième œil...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200270_CID<tab>Perhaps mine helped me recognize you─or perhaps it was just a lucky guess.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200270_CID<tab>C'est peut-être pour ça que j'avais deviné, grâce à mon intuition.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200280_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> was made for this! To carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200280_CID<tab>Tu sais, l'Entreprise permet à des héros comme vous de rejoindre les fronts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200290_CID<tab>I am proud to be able to call her my own.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200290_CID<tab>Je suis fier d'être capitaine de ce vaisseau.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cid─what exactly do you remember?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cid... vous avez retrouvé la mémoire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200310_CID<tab>Alphinaud, my boy─sorry to have been such a burden.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200310_CID<tab>Alphinaud, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Tu n'auras plus à t'en faire pour moi.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200320_CID<tab>I remember everything...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200320_CID<tab>Mon nom est Cid<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200330_CID<tab>My name, my people, and my purpose. Everything.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200330_CID<tab>Je dirige les Forges de Garlond<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200340_CID<tab>Come! It would be rude to keep Garuda waiting!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200340_CID<tab>En avant<var 1D /var>! Il est l'heure d'aller mettre une bonne raclée à Garuda<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300350_CID<tab>It took a while for the memory to return, but I remember you.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300350_CID<tab>Quand je pense que je ne t'avais pas reconnu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300360_CID<tab>The floating isle, van Darnus... We ended it, that day─or so we thought.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300360_CID<tab>Après tout ce qu'on a vécu ensemble lors la bataille finale, il y a cinq ans...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300370_CID<tab>Listen─let's keep this between the two of us, for the time being.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300370_CID<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, je ne dirai à personne que tu es encore en vie.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300380_CID<tab>If word got out that one of the Warriors of Light had returned, the eyes of the world would soon be upon us─our enemies' included. And that's the kind of attention we could well do without.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300380_CID<tab>Si ça se savait, on ne te lâcherait plus, c'est sûr<var 1D /var>! Après tout, tu fais partie des héros de la bataille de Carteneau.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300390_CID<tab>What, isn't it enough that <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know the truth?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300390_CID<tab>Mais l'important, c'est que <var 1A 02 /var>moi<var 1A 01 /var>, je m'en souvienne, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300400_CID<tab>Don't worry. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your talents won't go unnoticed for long. Someday, they <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> remember you─and you'll never know another moment's peace!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300400_CID<tab>Tu es quelqu'un d'ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel. Je suis sûr que les autres s'en souviendront un jour... en attendant, tu pourras déjà compter sur moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300410_CID<tab>There, up ahead! Ready, old friend?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300410_CID<tab>On approche<var 1D /var>! Tu es prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300420_CID<tab>Hah! Some things never change! We're going in!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300420_CID<tab>Ça me rappelle le bon vieux temps<var 1D /var>! En avant<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>All our efforts...all our travails...all of it was for this.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Nous avons réussi à passer le mur de bourrasques<var 1D /var>! Garuda doit être derrière cette porte... le temps de la confrontation est arrivé.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Make ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for the end is nigh─be it hers or our own.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Tout ce que nous avons vécu jusqu'à ce moment précis, tout cela était en préparation de ce combat. Allons-y, maintenant, et écrasons la Souffleuse de rafales<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_100_021<tab>Beyond those gates awaits our foe. Are you prepared to meet with her?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_100_021<tab>Garuda est redoutable, mais nous avons aussi gagné en puissance au cours de ce long voyage. En avant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_051<tab>(-???-)Who dares intrude upon my sanctuary!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_051<tab>(-???-)Insolents<var 1D /var>!! Vous avez détruit le mur de Gigameth<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_052<tab>(-???-)Your insolence shall not go unpunished, landwalkers!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_052<tab>(-???-)Maudites vermines... Vous oubliez qui vous êtes<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>Twelve preserve...she's...she's <var 1A 02 /var>huge<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>C... c'est Garuda<var 1D /var>? Ce vent est si fort...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_054<tab>As I live and breathe...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_054<tab>Elle est fidèle à sa réputation, elle semble plus cruelle que tous les autres.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_055<tab>Over there─look.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Regarde, là-bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_056<tab>Amalj'aa and kobold prisoners. But why would the Ixal bring them here...?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_056<tab>Ils gardent d'autres hommes-bêtes captifs<var 1D /var>! Ce sont des sacrifices pour Garuda<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_057<tab>Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_057<tab>Ahahahaha<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_058<tab>Wherefore come you hither, foolish mortals!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_058<tab>Maudites vermines rampantes<var 1D /var>! Cet endroit est MON domaine<var 1D /var>!! Ignorez-vous donc à qui vous avez affaire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>Garuda! We are come to put an end to your reign of terror!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>Nous le savons très bien<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes venus pour t'abattre, Primordiale du vent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_060<tab>Hear you this blasphemy, my children? These landwalkers would bring me low!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_060<tab>Avez-vous entendu, vous autres<var 1D /var>!? Les vermines grouillantes murmurent quelque chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_061<tab>You who are bound to crawl upon the earth should revere me─FOR I AM THE WIND!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_061<tab>Les vers de terre doivent savoir quelle est leur place<var 1D /var>! Ils sont censés ramper au sol en me vénérant, et rien de plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_062<tab>Did we not take to the skies, and slip your defenses!? We are bound by <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var>, Garuda!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_062<tab>En attendant, même des vermines arrivent à s'élever dans les airs pour t'atteindre<var 1D /var>! Et maintenant, elles vont te vaincre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_063<tab>You think your playthings give you strength?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_063<tab>Les cieux m'appartiennent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_064<tab>They will not help you here, landwalker. This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> realm, where none can challenge my supremacy! Struggle though you may─I shall slake the roots with your blood, and festoon the canopy with your ENTRAILS! HAHAHAHAHAAA!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_064<tab>Les vermines n'ont pas le droit de rêver de voler... Je vais leur arracher les entrailles et répandre leur sang partout, pour que plus jamais elles ne rêvent<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_IXALGURU_000_065<tab>Squaaawk! Slay the unfeathered ones, we shall! As an offering to Garuda, they will serve!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_IXALGURU_000_065<tab>Ceux-ci vont trancher les ennemis de Garuda<var 1D /var>! Ceux-ci vont massacrer les misérables sans-plumes<var 1D /var>! Que ceux-ci les arrachent à la terre sacrée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_066<tab>Leave the Ixal to us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We will keep them distracted while you deal with her!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_066<tab>On va retenir les emplumés<var 1D /var>! Toi, tu dois vaincre Garuda<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>Do not fail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Remember: you fight for the Scions! For Eorzea!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>C'est la dernière bataille contre les Primordiaux, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Pour les Héritiers... pour Éorzéa, je vous en conjure, vous devez réussir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_068<tab>This worm would die by mine own hand! Come, then...I shall grant you that which you seek!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_068<tab>Je vais te lacérer, te mettre en pièces, balayer tes ailes d'avorton, arracher tes jambes et tes bras jusqu'à ce que tu te tordes de douleur et réclames la mort<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_080<tab>No... Nooo! NO! NO!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_080<tab>Uaaaaarrrghh...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_081<tab>What!? How in the hells─!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_081<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_082<tab>HAHAHAHAHAAA! This...is...MY REALM! You have no hope here! None! NONNNE!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_082<tab>Ahahahaha<var 1D /var>!! Toutes vos actions sont futiles<var 1D /var>! Vous ne faites que vous ridiculiser avant de mourir<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_083<tab>Did you truly believe you could defy a god, landwalkers!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_083<tab>Stupides vermines<var 1D /var>!! Vous n'espériez tout de même pas me vaincre aussi facilement<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_084<tab>My power is limitless! My children legion!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_084<tab>Mes serviteurs ont rassemblé des quantités infinies de cristaux<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_085<tab>And they have rendered unto me a wealth of crystals.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_085<tab>Le pouvoir du cristal est MON pouvoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_086<tab>Their gifts sustain me, their faith empowers me!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_086<tab>Vous pouvez tenter de m'acculer, mais mes fidèles continuent de prier<var 1D /var>! Et leurs prières me rendent plus forte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_087<tab>None save my children will escape the reckoning, mortals! And those who would use <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> crystals to waken the rest shall realize the folly of their faith!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_087<tab>Cette terre n'a plus de dieu, ni de pouvoir<var 1D /var>! J'ai absorbé tous les cristaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_088<tab>Then all shall worship none but me! The one <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> god! HEE HEE HEE HEE HEEEEEE!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_088<tab>Je suis la plus puissante et la plus redoutable des Primordiaux<var 1D /var>! Ahahahaha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>...Of course! <var 1A 02 /var>Worship<var 1A 01 /var>! So long as the Ixal keep praying, she will never fall!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Nous devons empêcher les Ixali de prier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_090<tab>Then let's stop them!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_090<tab>Je te suis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Aargh<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_092HAHA hahaha HEEHEE heehee HAHAHA!!!
No harm will come to you, my children!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_092<tab>Ahahaha<var 1D /var>! Vous croyez que je vais vous laisser faire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_093<tab>This is only the beginning, landwalkers! All who oppose me shall suffer for their defiance!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_093<tab>Pour m'avoir insultée, et pour avoir porté la main sur mes serviteurs, vous allez payer, vermines<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_094<tab>Soon, the worms of the forest shall receive my judgment! The desert vermin next─their walls of stone will not shield them from the tempest!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_094<tab>Et en premier, les vers gridaniens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_095<tab>And then will I take vengeance on the sea lice! Their wooden boats cannot outrun the wind!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_095Puis les vermisseaux d'Ul'dah, balayés comme des grains de sable!!
Et ceux de Limsa Lominsa, emportés par un cyclone!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_096<tab>Tremble, mortals, for I shall visit you all in time! And all shall be mine! ALL MIIINE!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_096<tab>Mes ouragans vont balayer tout Éorzéa, et emporter toute la vermine sans distinction<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_097<tab>You, landwalker─you who <var 1A 02 /var>dared<var 1A 01 /var> to raise your hand against me─you shall be the first to pay for your sins! Not with your death─but with your LIFE!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_097<tab>On commence par vous<var 1D /var>! La mort n'est pas un châtiment assez sévère pour les affronts que vous avez osé me faire<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_098<tab>You will serve me, landwalker...to your last breath!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_098<tab>Et toi... je vais faire de toi un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> subjugué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!! Tu pourras continuer de ramper au sol jusqu'à la fin de ta misérable existence, en me vénérant jour après jour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_099<tab>No, NO!!! I claimed you! You should be MINE!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_099<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Pourquoi n'es-tu pas subjugué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!? Obéis-moi<var 1D /var>! Je t'ai soumis<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, tu dois te plier à ma volonté<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_100<tab>What...what <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you? What have you done to me!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_100<tab>Mon corps... mes forces... me quittent<var 1D /var>!? Le pouvoir... du Cristal... il m'abandonne...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_101<tab>No mortal should possess such power! This...this is impossible!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_101<tab>Qu-quelle est cette force... comment un simple asticot peut avoir une telle puissance<var 1D /var>!? C'est impossible<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600430_GARUDA<tab>Why do you not tremble at my might? Why do you not beg for mercy!? Why do you not DIE!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600430_GARUDA<tab>Pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi ne ployez-vous pas, misérables<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600440_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've done it!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600440_ALPHINAUD<tab>On a réussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600450_IXAL<tab>Squaaak! Impossible, it is!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600450_IXAL<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Comment est-ce possible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600460_IXAL<tab>Garuda, kill you all!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600460_IXAL<tab>Garuda<var 1D /var>! Garuda<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600470_GAIUS<tab>Is that all!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600470_GAIUS<tab>C'est déjà terminé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600480_GAIUS<tab>O Lady of the Vortex! O mighty Garuda!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600480_GAIUS<tab>Garuda... C'en est déjà fini de toi, la divinité des rafales<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600490_GAIUS<tab>Of all primals, the most terrible. I say again...IS─THAT─ALL!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600490_GAIUS<tab>Toi qui es la plus cruelle et la plus vicieuse des Primordiaux... Est-ce là toute l'étendue de tes pouvoirs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600500_CID<tab>Gaius!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600500_CID<tab>Gaius<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600510_GAIUS<tab>Ah, Cid, my boy. You look well─for one who has forsaken <var 1A 02 /var>kin<var 1A 01 /var> and country. I wonder, what else you will forsake before the day is done.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600510_GAIUS<tab>Tiens donc, Cid... Après avoir fui ton père, ton pays, et même moi... Qui vas-tu trahir, cette fois-ci<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600520_CID<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600520_CID<tab>Comment oses-tu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600530_GAIUS<tab>What exactly did you hope to accomplish here this day?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600530_GAIUS<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu fais là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600540_CID<tab>I...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600540_CID<tab>Je...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600550_GAIUS<tab>Well, I shall accomplish far more!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600550_GAIUS<tab>Sache que j'œuvre ici pour l'intérêt général.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600560_GARUDA<tab>...Is that all? IS THAT ALL!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600560_GARUDA<tab>Comment oses-tu, vermine<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600570_GARUDA<tab>Insolent mortal! I shall make you suffer!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600570_GARUDA<tab>Je suis le Primordial suprême<var 1D /var>! Comment un misérable humain ose-t-il me manquer de respect<var 1D /var>? Rwaaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600580_GARUDA<tab>That foul stench... I see now... <var 1A 02 /var>She<var 1A 01 /var> has touched you!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600580_GARUDA<tab>Je sais... j'ai compris... c'est la protection d'Hydaelyn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600590_GARUDA<tab>Very well...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600590_GARUDA<tab>Très bien... Puisque c'est comme ça...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600600_CID<tab>Seven hells, does she still mean to fight!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600600_CID<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'elle manigance<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600610_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is she─ Twelve preserve, she cannot mean to─
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais... ce sont des Amalj'aa et des Kobolds<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600620_AMALJAA<tab>(-Amalj'aa-)O Lord of the Inferno! Almighty Ifrit! Grant us succor in our hour of need!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600620_AMALJAA<tab>Aaaaarrgh<var 1D /var>! Un dernier souhait, nous avons<var 1D /var>! Pour nous sauver, descends<var 1D /var>! Ô Ifrit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600630_KOBOLD<tab>(-Kobolds-)Save us, Titan, Lord of Crags! Ah, it hurts us so, the pain, the pain...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600630_KOBOLD<tab>Arrêtez, arrêtez<var 1D /var>! Vous nous faites mal<var 1D /var>! Viens nous sauver Titan, nous sauver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600640_ALPHINAUD<tab>No... No, this is all wrong...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non... J'ai peur de comprendre...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600650_CID<tab>Stop gawping, boy! We must <var 1A 02 /var>run<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600650_CID<tab>C'est pas le moment de rester plantés là<var 1D /var>! On dégage, vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600660_GARUDA<tab>Surrender yourselves unto me... I would feast upon your aether. NONE SHALL STAND AGAINST THE WIND!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600660_GARUDA<tab>Faibles Primordiaux<var 1D /var>! Je vais vous absorber pour devenir plus puissante que jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700670_GAIUS<tab>BEAR WITNESS TO THE GLORY OF THE EMPIRE!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700670_GAIUS<tab>Proto-Ultima<var 1D /var>! Montre-lui ta force<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700680_GAIUS<tab>It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who will suffer, Garuda!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700680_GAIUS<tab>Qui est à craindre, maintenant, Garuda<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700690_GAIUS<tab>Ancient Allag had ways of dealing with your kind. Now, look on their ultimate weapon, eikon, and despair!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700690_GAIUS<tab>Tremble devant l'arme anti-Primordiaux des anciens Allagois... Tremble devant l'Ultima Arma, la dernière fantaisie des anciens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700700_GARUDA<tab>No... Nooo! NOOO!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700700_GARUDA<tab>Ultima Arma... Noooon<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700710_GAIUS<tab>Magnificent! It exceeds all expectation!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700710_GAIUS<tab>Magnifique<var 1D /var>! Quelle puissance... Elle devrait écraser les Primordiaux sans mal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700720_LAHABREAEORZEA<tab>With each primal it consumes, it grows more powerful. A marvel, is it not?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700720_LAHABREAEORZEA<tab>En assimilant les Primordiaux, l'Ultima Arma devrait atteindre son plein potentiel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700730_GAIUS<tab>Such is the fate of those who oppose the Empire!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700730_GAIUS<tab>Ceux qui s'opposent à l'Empire seront réduits en poussière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700740_GAIUS<tab>There will be no Warriors of Light to save you this time.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700740_GAIUS<tab>Ces Guerriers de la Lumière qui vous ont jadis sauvés, ils n'existent plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700750_GAIUS<tab>If your leaders are as wise as they are reported, they will surrender.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700750_GAIUS<tab>Alors, misérables dirigeants d'Éorzéa, qu'allez-vous faire, à présent<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700760_GAIUS<tab>Your skills are impressive, but they will not be enough.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700760_GAIUS<tab>Je suis curieux, très curieux de voir la suite des événements.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Twelve have mercy! What chance have we against such an ungodly creation!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais qu'est-ce qu'il s'est passé<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que c'était que cette chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700780_ALPHINAUD<tab>And who was that armored devil!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et qui est cet homme en armure<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700790_CID<tab>That was Gaius van Baelsar, legatus of the XIVth Imperial Legion, and supreme commander of the Garlean invasion force in Eorzea.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700790_CID<tab>Le général Gaius van Baelsar, le commandant de la 14e légion impériale... Celle-là même qui tente d'envahir Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course, the Black Wolf─how could I not realize? Grandfather mentions him in his journal!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Le “loup noir”... Les notes de mon grand-père parlaient de lui.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700810_CID<tab>I was never so naive as to think the man would abandon his ambitions, but these developments are beyond my worst expectations...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700810_CID<tab>Je ne croyais pas qu'il avait renoncé à son ambition de conquête d'Éorzéa, mais de là à penser qu'il avait un tel atout dans son jeu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700820_CID<tab>What have you been doing these past five years? How could something of this magnitude have escaped the Alliance's attention?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700820_CID<tab>Il me semblait pourtant que l'Empire avait fait profil bas pendant ma période de blanc...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700830_ALPHINAUD<tab>We heard no whispers, saw no signs. In the wake of the Calamity, the Empire seized land and built outposts, but that was the extent of their aggression.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700830_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est exact. À notre con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, ils n'ont pas effectué de grosses manœuvres depuis la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de leurs bases.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700840_CID<tab>Damn it, Gaius, where in the seven hells did you find that thing?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700840_CID<tab>Maudit Gaius... Qu'est-ce qu'il peut bien mijoter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700850_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been a day of unexpected developments, but the fact remains: Garuda is no longer a threat.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700850_ALPHINAUD<tab>En tout cas, la menace que représentait Garuda a disparu, même si c'est d'une manière inattendue...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700860_ALPHINAUD<tab>While I take no comfort in the manner of her downfall, it <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> mean that we may safely put the matter of the primals to one side─for the time being, at least.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je dirais même qu'on n'aura sans doute plus à se préoccuper des Primordiaux pendant quelque temps.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700870_CID<tab>Which just leaves the matter of Gaius's new toy.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700870_CID<tab>Mais c'est de l'Empire qu'on va devoir s'inquiéter, maintenant.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. That weapon poses the greatest threat to Eorzea. It must be destroyed.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700880_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet. Cette arme pourrait mettre en danger Éorzéa. Nous devons la neutraliser au plus vite.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700890_ALPHINAUD<tab>But first, we must needs find out all we can.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais sans plus d'information, nous ne pourrons agir. Il faut nous retirer et reprendre des forces avant d'étudier une stratégie de frappe.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us make for Vesper Bay. We shall rebuild the Scions.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Commençons par rentrer au Refuge des sables.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700910_ALPHINAUD<tab>All is not yet lost, my friend─for we bear the light, and shall surely lead our people from the darkness.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700910_ALPHINAUD<tab>Notre lueur d'espoir brille, et nous, Héritiers de la Septième Aube, nous ne la laisserons pas vaciller. C'est à nous de la faire grandir pour qu'elle illumine l'horizon.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_900<tab>Well, that was an experience I would rather not have again.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_900<tab>Nous voici enfin arrivés. Avec tout ce qui s'est passé en un laps de temps très court, je n'ai plus les idées très claires.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_901<tab>Something has been troubling me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Shortly before the Black Wolf took center stage, when Garuda attempted to claim you as her own, I could have sworn I saw...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_901<tab>Mais <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Comment se fait-il que face à Garuda, vous ayez...

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_902<tab>Ah, but I'm sure I was mistaken. In times of great stress, the evidence of the eye is apt to be misread by even the most inquiring mind. Forget I mentioned it.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_902<tab>Non, oubliez ce que je viens de dire. Ce qui compte, c'est que nous ayons triomphé de notre ennemi.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_903<tab>Returning to the subject of our earlier discussion, we may consider the matter of the primals closed until further notice. No beast tribe will <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> summon their god so long as that weapon exists.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_903<tab>Maintenant que Garuda a été éliminée, on peut espérer que les tribus barbares renonceront à invoquer leurs Primordiaux... car nous avons démontré qu'ils ne sont pas des êtres suprêmes, et qu'ils peuvent être anéantis.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_904<tab>Truly, a more effective deterrent I could not imagine. It almost seems a shame to plot its destruction...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_904<tab>Nous avons résolu la crise des Primordiaux qui menaçaient Éorzéa... du moins pour le moment.

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_050_031<tab>You know, it's not easy guiding the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> through a ceaselessly swirling wall of wind. I would rather not risk our lives again until you're sure─meaning absolutely <var 1A 02 /var>certain<var 1A 01 /var>─that you're ready. Are you?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_050_031<tab>Garuda se trouve sur son autel, protégée par les bourrasques. Veux-tu aller à Hurlœil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q2_000_031<tab>Travel to the Howling Eye?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q2_000_031<tab>Se déplacer vers Hurlœil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_LIONNELLAIS_050_032<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you wish to proceed to your vessel?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_LIONNELLAIS_050_032<tab>Souhaitez-vous entrer dans la zone d'embarquement pour accéder au quai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q3_000_032<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q3_000_032<tab>Accéder au quai d'embarquement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ELYENORA_050_033<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you wish to proceed to your vessel?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ELYENORA_050_033<tab>Souhaitez-vous entrer dans la zone d'embarquement pour accéder au quai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q4_000_033<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q4_000_033<tab>Accéder au quai d'embarquement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_035<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_035<tab>Oui

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_036<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_036<tab>Non
